General.Name: Vitruvio Real Estate Socimi
General.Description: Vitruvio Real Estate Socimi, S.A. owns a portfolio of real estate properties for rent, primarily in the center of Madrid, Barcelona, and the Basque Country, Spain. It manages office and residential buildings, as well as commercial premises. The company has elected to be taxed as a real estate investment trust. As a result, it would not be subject to corporate income tax on that portion of its net income that is distributed to shareholders. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Madrid, Spain.
General.Address: Plaza de la Independencia 6, Madrid, Spain, 28001
